mapper.select: SELECT W_SEQ, ID, W_TITLE, W_CONTENT, W_REGDATE, W_REF, W_DELFLAG, W_REPLY FROM MINFO_BOARD ORDER BY W_REF
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MINFO_BOARD VALUES (MINFO_BOARD_w_seq.NEXTVAL, #{id},#{w_title},#{w_content},SYSDATE,(SELECT NVL(MAX(w_ref)+1,0) FROM MINFO_BOARD),0,0,'N','N')
mapper.update: UPDATE MINFO_BOARD SET W_TITLE=#{w_title},W_CONTENT=#{w_content} , W_REGDATE=SYSDATE WHERE W_SEQ=#{w_seq}
UPDATE MINFO_BOARD SET W_READCOUNT=W_READCOUNT+1 WHERE W_SEQ=#{w_seq}
UPDATE MINFO_BOARD SET W_STEP=W_STEP+1 WHERE W_REF=(SELECT W_REF FROM MINFO_BOARD WHERE W_SEQ=#{w_seq}) AND W_STEP > (SELECT W_STEP FROM MINFO_BOARD WHERE W_SEQ=#{w_seq})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MINFO_BOARD VALUES (MINFO_BOARD_W_SEQ.nextval,#{id},#{w_title},#{w_content},SYSDATE ,(SELECT W_REF FROM MINFO_BOARD WHERE W_SEQ=#{w_seq}) ,(SELECT W_STEP FROM MINFO_BOARD WHERE W_SEQ=#{w_seq})+1 ,0 ,'N','N')
